howItWorksEcomm.howisitpossibledescription: We’ve spent the last 10 years developing the industry’s leading Identity Network built for permission-based channels. With Wunderkind, you get an out-of-the-box, privacy-compliant performance marketing solution for eCommerce that delivers unrivaled revenue by leveraging your first-party data at scale.
howItWorksEcomm.howisitpossiblecookiedescription: Don’t fear the cookiepocalpyse. Our Identity Network is not reliant on third-party cookies.
howItWorksEcomm.howisitpossiblegraphdescriptiondesktop: With hundreds of millions of consumers represented in our graph, our network leverages actionable consumer insights, AI, and machine learning to help you monetize your traffic like never before and dramatically scale your one-to-one messages.
howItWorksEcomm.howisitpossiblegraphdescriptionmobile: With hundreds of millions of consumers represented in our graph, our network leverages actionable consumer insights, AI, and machine learning to help you monetize your traffic like never before and dramatically scale your one-to-one messages.
howItWorksEcomm.howisitpossiblerevenuedescriptiondesktop: It helped us drive over $5 billion in directly attributable revenue for our clients last year.
howItWorksEcomm.howisitpossiblerevenuedescriptionmobile: It helped us drive over $5 billion in directly attributable revenue for our clients last year.
